meanings.def: a plant grown for its grain that is used to produce the flour for bread, cakes, pasta, etc.; the grain of this plant
to recognize the difference between useful or valuable people or things and those that are not useful or have no value
examples: We sifted through the application forms to separate the wheat from the chaff.

idioms.idiom: sort out/separate the wheat from the chaff
idioms.def: to recognize the difference between useful or valuable people or things and those that are not useful or have no value
examples: We sifted through the application forms to separate the wheat from the chaff.

related: sort out/separate the wheat from the chaff
